org.gradle.api.artifacts

Interface DirectDependency

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dependency
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClientModule, ExternalDependency, ExternalModuleDependency, FileCollectionDependency, ModuleDependency, ProjectDependency, SelfResolvingDependency

    @Incubating
public interface DirectDependency
extends Dependency
    Implementations of this interface always describe direct dependencies and not constraints may optionally considered as dependency.
    Since:
    4.5

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.gradle.api.artifacts.Dependency

        ARCHIVES_CONFIGURATION, CLASSIFIER, DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.api.artifacts.Dependency

        contentEquals, copy, getGroup, getName, getVersion
